content: this is a really simple slouchy hat that even a beginner could handle it s a heavier slouchy hat that is perfect for colder days and nights you can make it a solid color or change colors after every round to make stripes i made a couple that are half and half i ve noted the color change in the pattern if you like that look and want to do it that way **supplies ** chunky yarn **stitches & techniques used ** this pattern uses only basic crochet stitches double & single_crochet in joined rounds as well as double & single decreases **terms of use ** you are welcome to sell any items you make using this pattern as long as you credit julie king / gleeful things & link to www gleefulthings com this pattern is protected by united states & international copyright law you may not sell or redistribute this pattern in part or in whole copyright © 2010 julie king / gleeful things all rights reserved
